title: Conspiracy theorists think Tupac Shakur alive and well in South Africa
text:
Fans are still convinced that Tupac Shakur didn’t actually die back in 1996 thanks to a new ‘picture’ of the rapper (Picture: Getty Images)

Tupac Shakur famously died back in 1996 but there are a lot of people on the internet who think the whole thing was a sham.

And now a new picture has emerged which claims to show the iconic rapper living out his life in South Africa.

The rap legend was shot in Las Vegas in September 1996 while in a car with Suge Knight, former CEO of Death Row Records.

The 25-year-old was shot twice in the chest, once in the arm and once in the thigh, and he died six days later in hospital from internal bleeding… or did he?

A video uploaded by Icini Studios shared the selfie-style image of a man in his 40s walking down a street at night.

While it’s hard to get a clear look at the man’s face, that hasn’t stopped people from feeling sure that it is the face of the not-so-late rapper Tupac.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Look at his shoulders, that’s a healthy Pac,’ one person wrote.

‘Without a doubt that is definitely 2pac OMG,’ another added.

There have been so many theories over the years about the whereabouts of the rapper despite the fact he was cremated following his death.

According to onlookers around the world, the legendary rapper has been ‘spotted’ in various countries in the years after his passing.

description: A new picture has emerged which claims to show iconic rapper Tupac Shakur living out in South Africa and conspiracy theorists are excited.
